name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Sources say the FBI raided Michael Cohen's office to gather information on all of the women the President had affairs with. The raid is currently entering its 27th hour.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Experts say the majority of Facebook users had their data harvested from taking online quizzes. So, it’s worse than we thought - now, Russia also knows how stupid we are.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Sen. Lindsey Graham asked Mark Zuckerberg if there was anything else like Facebook, and Zuckerberg said, "No." And at that exact moment, Tom from MySpace took his own life.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A motorcycle gang in Canada is attacking businesses they don’t like by giving them mass one-star reviews online. They're the fearsome badass biker gang known as "Yelp's Angels."
